alert.note: Alert for Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:33PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fremont County through 700 PM MDT... At 633 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hidden Valley, which is also 9 miles northeast of Riverton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hidden Valley and Boysen State Park around 640 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Shoshoni. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
